attributes.additional_details: the house only for emergency reason it will help get rid of this virus going to have to put the army on the street doing road blocks making sure people aren’t leaving there areas 1 month is not going to hurt doing a very strict lockdown but keep going on like we are going now this probably be our last Christmas all probably be wiped out by next year by this new virus
attributes.background: Close Absolutely everything just keep food retail open and police and nhs and chemists tell the country they got 1 week to do a food shop then shut the whole country down for a month literallly no leaving

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Start a second lockdown including closing schools to prevent spread of COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550736

Implement full 6-week lockdown including closure of shops and businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553580
